#summary How to create template in Zenah
#sidebar sidebarnav

= Introduction =

Better than theory, I will show you how to create an iPhone template.


= Details =

First thing is to named your template and tell Zenah engine with template to use.
You will find inside the source 'iPhone_template.sql'. This SQL file will add the iPhone Template to the Zenah engine.
